page.title: 04LEISURE AND FAMILIES
page.content: of the Watch Group and he has a pet tortoise called Woody. I am the youngest member of the family and my name is Conrad and I am nine years old.My hobbies are snooker,going to dog shows with my dog Elsa and interest in wild life. I am learning to play the mouth organ. We all have a happy{home life}except when my brothers and I start to fight. For our{recreation}we like to play football,watch television,play outdoors with friends or draw and colour. Our Mums like to knit and watch{television}mostly but they also like to cook,read,go shopping or do the gardening. The favourite pastime of dads is going to the pub, driving the car or watching television.The favourite television programme of adults is Coronation Street and for children cartoons are the favourite.
